location: CEO OFFICE, MIRANDO COMPANY HEADQUARTERS, MANHATTAN

text: SUBTITLES: 10 years ago. 2006. An expansive, modern CEO office. Late afternoon sunlight pierces the 74th floor of the Mirando Company. The compan green tree logo covers one of the walls. A woman stands at the window, her back filling the SCREEN She looks down at the lesser Manhattan skyscrapers. This LUCY MIRANDO (40s). On the window are arrows pointing at the various Mirando subsidiaries scattered throughout Manhattan: Mirando Orga Harvesting, Mirando Peachy Delight Baking Company, Mirand Chemicals, Mirando Tenderloin Fine Dining Supplies, Miran Biotech, Mirando Hungry Pirates Burgers, Mirando Transformatives, Mirando Happy Pups Good Boy! Treats. Lucy's breath mists over the arrows. She mumbles to herse in a small voice, practicing some kind of speech. A hand reaches in - holding a cosmetics brush - and begin gently brush Lucy's face. From 0.S a spray of HAIR SPRAY coats Lucy's hair. WIDE: Lucy is surrounded by a MAKEUP ARTIST, a HAIR STYLI and MIRANDO COMPANY EMPLOYEES, including Lucy's senior assistant FRANK DAWSON (60).
I'm a huge fan. Lucy looks at her, surprised.

Of your Tenderloin Fricassee ready meal. They both glance at an ADVERTISING POSTER framed on the w a photograph of a FARMER gently stroking a cow's face. Th slogan: THE SECRET INGREDIENT IN OUR TENDERLOINS? TENDERN
So what's all this about? The reporters out there...
Ms. Mirando doesn't want to have a conversation right now, dear.
(Smiling) It's okay, Frank. I'm not my sister! (To the Make-Up Lady) I am announcing a miracle.

The conference room is packed with REPORTERS and TV CREWS A spotlight shines on a small potted tree in the corner o the stage. It looks uncannily similar to the Mirando Comp logo. Lucy stands on the stage. She's charismatic, modern, mayb slightly vulnerable. The sight calls to mind a Steve Jobs product launch or Gwyneth Paltrow delivering a TED talk.

On a Spring morning three years ago a Chilean farmer named Senor Victor Zamora Villacorta was tending to his pigs when he chanced upon something very strange. A beat. Lucy has the reporters' attention. Lucy outstretc her long, graceful arm and clicks on the touchscreen behi her. A PHOTOGRAPH fills the screen of a CHILEAN FARMER posing the camera. He looks wise, old, kind - straight out of Chilean Farmer Central Casting.
I recently had the opportunity to meet with Senor Villacorta at his hilltop farm. Each time Lucy says Senor Villacorta's name, she does so a slight Chilean twang.
We sat out on his porch and drank wine as the sun went down. Another PHOTOGRAPH appears on the screen, this time of Lu and Senor Villacorta drinking wine at sunset. A picture- perfect rustic setting.
He said the sweetest thing to me. "Lucy! (MORE )

Why couldn't this miracle have happened forty years ago when I was looking for a wife! I could have married a supermodel!" Well, I'm sorry Senor Villacorta. It turns out we don't choose when we get to save humanity. Lucy makes a peculiar hand gesture. The words "Saving Humanity" appear on the screen in hundreds of languages, various styles of calligraphy.

(urgently) The world's population is at seven billion. 805 million of our fellow humans struggle with hunger each day, including 30 million right here in the United States. A PHOTO-MONTAGE of WORRIED-LOOKING HUMANS from across the globe fills the screen behind Lucy. They look lost, helpl in need of a leader.

And by 2050? We'll somehow have to feed a staggering 9.6 billion people. The world is running out of food and we are not talking about it. We needed a miracle. And then we got one - on Senor Villacorta's little hilltop farm. The lights dim. Music swells.
Say hello to Mary. A photograph fills the screen of Senor Villacorta cradlin VERY ODD-LOOKING PIGLET in his arms. The room falls silen the fascinated Reporters stare at the very odd piglet.

All the other piglets in the litter were normal. But this peculiar little lady turned out to be about the least normal thing you can imagine. Our scientists at the Mirando Ranch in Arizona have been raising Mary with love and care ever since, observing her and performing various studies. And I can tell you the results right now. (MORE )
(Beat) Mary is like nothing on earth. FRANK watches Lucy speak from below the stage. He quietly mouths 'like nothing on Earth' in time with her.

And so, please welcome to the stage the inspirational ... Senor Victor Zamora Villacorta! SENOR VILLACORTA walks onto the stage and stands in his predesignated spot. He's dressed in his full farmer's out There's a smattering of dutiful applause from the reporte
Uh, no offence to Senor...
Villacorta.
But we'd prefer to see the pig.
(Smiling) You will. But not yet.

You're announcing the birth of the world's most amazing pig and you're not showing us the pig? You're a temptress! The British reporter gives Lucy a sleazy, misogynistic gr Lucy responds with a mock-scolding look.
(Winking) You're much more fun than the last Chief Executive!

Of course I am. Peter. Yes, she's my sister, but Nancy and I are very different human beings with very different business ethics. Very different. The only thing we share is our last name. Lucy smiles, but her composure is slightly rattled. A question from the audience ends the brief silence.
What's so great about this pig anyway?
She has an impressive reproduction rate. The Reporters look underwhelmed.

(A small smile) A regular sow averages five or six piglets in a litter and two litters in a year. Mary has mated with one of our best hogs while she’s been living with us in Arizona, and she’s had a few piglets. Would you care to see them? Lucy makes a hand gesture. A FILM fills the screen of A HUNDRED very odd-looking piglets grazing the beautiful, grassy acres of the Mirando Ranch. A beat while the reporters take it in. Then the room ERUP with a volley of QUESTIONS and CAMERA FLASHES. Under the stage, Frank SMILES. This is going exactly to p
How the hell did one pig have so many babies?
(Beat) She got big. The reporters take in the implication.
And her babies are going to get big too.
Show us a picture of the big pig!

(Smiling) Simon! Patience! Last week we sent twenty-six of Mary's Super Piglets to the twenty-six countries around the world where our Mirando branch offices are located.  6. The screen behind Lucy becomes a colorful world map. Thro cool graphics we see the Super Piglets being spread to Ne Zealand, Brazil, France, Sweden, Spain, Germany, Denmark, South Korea, Japan, South Africa, and so on.

Each piglet was given to an esteemed local farmer. A PHOTOMONTAGE of SUPER PIGLETS being handed by MIRANDO EMPLOYEES to charismatic-looking FARMERS in picture-perfe locations. Faces of all shapes and colors. A testament to global nature of the project.

I have asked each farmer to raise their special guests in a natural environment with the utmost care, honoring traditional techniques unique to their respective cultures. My top scientists at the Mirando branch offices will be on hand to offer whatever support is required. (beat) And now we have a competition! On the word 'Competition' the colorful world map reappear the large screen behind Lucy. The faces of the Local Farm appear over the map.

These little piggies will be the forebears of a whole new species! From these, we’ll pick the most exceptional specimens and develop them into a super breed! A revolution in the livestock industry! And one local farmer will rear the biggest and most beautiful and special one! The Ultimate Super Pig! But which farmer will it be? Will Denmark win? New Zealand? That's my bet! But I'm no expert. (beat) But I know someone who is! The judging panel will be led by none other than the wonderful Dr. Johnny Wiseman - TV’s most popular zoologist and veterinarian - and the new face of the Mirando Company! The reporters are taken aback.
Johnny Wiseman’s working for Mirando now?
Let’s remind ourselves of Dr. Johnny’s work. The screen behind Lucy fills with a MONTAGE of famous cli from the HUGELY SUCCESSFUL TV show DR. JOHNNY’S MAGICAL

A GORILLA throws straw in DR. JOHNNY’s face. Dr. Johnny laughs uproariously. Dr. Johnny lies underneath an ELEPHA washing its underside. The elephant takes a shit on Dr. Johnny's face. Dr. Johnny shrieks with laughter. Dr. John cuddles a Panda. Throughout it all we hear upbeat music - MAGICAL, MAGICAL
The MONTAGE ends.
(to the screen) Oh Johnny! (to the reporters - a little chilly) He's just hilarious.
How did you get Johnny Wiseman working for you?
Deep pockets, right?!

(smiling) We're just delighted to have him! (beat) When the competition reaches its climax, Dr. Johnny will crown the winner at a Magical Animals live telecast right here in New York City! THAT'S when we'll unveil our Super Pigs to the world! And, believe me, it'll be worth the wait. Senor Villacorta is still standing on his spot - awkwardl nobody paying him any attention.
How long will the wait be? When do we get to see the big pigs? For a beat, Lucy looks like she doesn't know what to say. Then she recovers.
Ten years.
Ten years?! Jesus Christ. I'll be dead by then!

This has to be the longest beauty contest in world history! If it was Miss America all the girls would be old and ugly by the end! They'd be putting the crown on the head of a wizened old hag! The sleazy British Reporter grins and looks around, pleas with himself for his joke. Frowns from a few of the femal reporters.

I don't think 10 years is a terribly long commitment, given that we’re developing an entirely new, scientifically ground-breaking species that will single-handedly remedy the planet’s food shortage crisis! Our super pigs will not only be big and beautiful, they'll be designed to leave a minimal footprint on the environment, consuming less feed and forage, producing less excretions. But most importantly ... Lucy creates a long, expectant beat.
They'll need to taste fucking good. A Pig-Faced Reporter blurts out ...

Goddamn right! Lucy and the other reporters laugh. The atmosphere is mer  9. Frank laughs and claps loudly as music begins to flow thr the speakers - The Isley Brothers' HARVEST FOR THE WORLD. .--All babies together, everyone a seed, half of us are satisfied, half of us in need... Love's bountiful in us, tarnished by our greed, when will there be a harvest for world?
Ten years. That's when there'll be a harvest for the world. Thank you. Words drift across the screen: 'The Super Pig Project.' ‘Saving Humanity.' 'Harvest for the World'.

Lucy Mirando slumps on the toilet with a cigarette in her mouth, sans makeup. She is web-searching articles on her cutting edge 2006 flip phone. Press photos of her dancing “Harvest For the World” pass through the screen. She begi mouthing words to herself. We don't know whether she's reading the article or reliving her speech. The phone begins to ring and the name "Nancy Mirando" fla across the screen in bold letters. Lucy debates whether t answer before shutting it.
Lucy washes her hands in front of the mirror. She feels something behind her and turns around to find... Frank awkwardly holding out his phone.
What is it?
It's Nancy. (looking at Lucy) She said you weren't answering...
(hushed voice) Are you working for me, or her? Jesus, Frank. Lucy's outburst barely affects Frank, who stares back wit innocent face. Lucy takes the phone.
Hey, sis! How's London?  10. A LONG SILENCE. We hear Nancy breathing down the phone.
(beat) Are you angry? Another hard silence.
(trying to keep it light) Come on, Nance! Don't be angry! Talk to me!
(finally) I think Denmark's going to win.
(happily) Really? Why do you think Denmark? A small, cold chuckle from Nancy.
Are you mocking me? Please don't mock me. (beat) Nance?
Yes, Luce?
(awkwardly) What I did today... Do you think Dad would have liked it?
Oh, Lucy, sweetheart. Poor darling. Dad would have thought you were a total cunt.
Lucy walks out of the bathroom and hands the phone to Fra waiting by the door. An EXTREME WIDE SHOT of Manhattan skyscrapers. We see Lucy as a small dot as she walks down infinite hallway.
The STREET NOISE and sounds of AIRPLANES are replaced by meditative SOUNDS OF NATURE - the mountain breeze and chirping birds.

A thick forest sits at the foot of a mountain range that stretches for miles. SUPERIMPOSE TITLE: "The Present Day. 2016." SUPERIMPOSE TITLE: "South Korea." When the TITLE disappears, we notice a tiny white dot mov in the woods far ahead. A person? An animal?

A SMALL GIRL carefully climbs down the hill, a straw sack over her shoulder, her face a mix of street-smart stubbornness and innocence. She is MIJA. We hear BUSTLING behind her - and see a VERY LARGE and VE STRANGE-LOOKING ANIMAL unsteadily tiptoeing down the hill is a fully grown SUPER PIG - OKJA. Okja clumsily makes her way down the hill, looking terrif She steps on a thorny chestnut bur and immediately freeze She looks back and forth between Mija and her foot with a blank expression. She looks silly - the hugely oversized creature with her foot daintily raised. Mija immediately runs over and plucks the chestnut bur fr Okja's foot. Okja blows through her nostrils in relief, s wearing the same blank expression. She is awesome in size but slow, and doesn't appear very intelligent.
From atop the hill, Mija looks down at a tree in the bott It teems with ripe orange persimmons.

Go! On Mija's command, Okja enters frame and runs downhill towards the tree. But she trips over her feet and begins tumbling and tumbling until...  12. .-.-she hits the tree trunk. THUMP. The tree is nearly pu out of the ground. Ripe persimmons fall everywhere. Okja raises herself, unfazed by the impact. Mija scuttles down and gathers the persimmons in her straw sack. She pi up the largest one and throws it to Okja, who snaps up he chin and catches it like a dog catching a tennis ball. CLOSE ON Okja's silly, innocent face as she moves her humongous jaws, savoring the juicy persimmon.

Mija peers into the water. She looks up and waves at Okja (O.S.) - indicating a part of the stream where the water deepest. Suddenly, Okja's colossal body fills the SCREEN as she fl across the air toward Mija. She splashes into the water, sending a mini-tsunami in all directions. Like when an obese person jumps into a small tub, copious amounts of water and FISH flow over the banks. The fish f around frantically. Mija quickly picks out the larger one puts them in the sack and throws the little ones back int the stream. Quick and efficient. A familiar routine. With her eyes and nostrils barely poking out of the water Okja takes a leisurely swim. Mija takes off her clothes a jumps in. They swim under the blissful autumn sunlight. A idyllic moment. It feels like time has stopped. Okja suddenly climbs onto a large rock. She shakes off th water like a dog and tightens, arching her body. Her larg ears point up in a peculiar fashion. Mija catches the 'signal'.

No! Wait! Okja glances at her and freezes. Mija quickly swims upstr until - at a safe distance - she gives Okja the 'OK' sign with both hands. With that... Okja's epic pooping begins. It is similar to the pooping of hippopotamuses. Okja spin her short tail like a helicopter as she projects fecal ma in all directions. A spectacular scene, with countless pi of shit flying across a wide radius. The excrements fall the water and fish gather around the pieces to feed on th The ‘circle of life' in full effect.  13. Okja jumps back in the water and the fish gather around h bottom. They swim gracefully as a school, chasing after whatever is left behind by Okja. EXT. NEAR THE STREAM — DAY Okja is sprawled on a rock next to the stream, taking a n Mija sleeps on Okja's belly, moving up and down every tim Okja takes a breath. Whenever Okja shifts, Mija adjusts, somehow maintaining her position on the belly. We notice a small BLACK BOX the size of a cell phone atta to Okja's ear.
Mija's grandfather, HEE BONG (70), carries firewood, gett ready to make dinner. The sun is falling fast. Hee Bong l toward the mountains with concern.
(Shouting) Mija! Where are you?

Hee Bong's voice echoes through the mountains. Inside Mij straw sack, half-submerged in water, a fish peeks through chestnuts and persimmons, still breathing. Mija jolts awake. She looks around blankly before realizi she slept too long. She shakes Okja awake. Okja spreads o her humongous jaws and yawns.
(to Okja) We're late for dinner. We'll take the short cut. Okja responds with a distinctive SQUEAL.

The short-cut is narrow and borders a steep incline. Mija Okja hurry down it. Mija notices that the rope around Okj neck is hanging limply off her. She turns to re-tie it, suddenly SLIPS, and FALLS down the incline, the rope in h hand. She slides towards a SHEER DROP.  14. She grabs a nearby scrub, which holds her for a moment, t SNAPS in her hand. She continues sliding, the cliff edge approaching sharply... Okja looks blankly down. Then she suddenly steps on her e of the rope. Mija's plummet abruptly STOPS. She dangles precariously over the cliff - her life barely preserved b the tip of Okja's foot. Okja lowers her enormous snout toward the rope, trying to pull Mija back up with her mouth. But her mouth and tongu are large and unwieldy. Okja struggles until - in a sudde move - she twists her neck and successfully bites the rop But as she does, she loses balance and begins sliding dow the incline. Still desperately holding onto the rope, Mija immediately drops several feet in the air. Then she suddenly STOPS. She looks up and sees Okja peeking over her, having slid the way to the edge of the cliff. The rope is tightly stretched between them. Large drops of drool escape throu Okja's fiercely clenched teeth and fall onto Mija's body. With an emphatic umph, Okja steps backwards, the rope in mouth. She somehow manages a few strenuous steps. But the rock that had been anchoring her foot suddenly comes loos and she begins sliding again. Mija SCREAMS as she goes into a free fall. Okja shrieks t as she slides towards the SHEER DROP. Suddenly, Okja spots a large tree stump below. With the r clenched in her mouth, she twists and steers her body tow the stump. Right before reaching the edge, she coils hers and jumps over to the other side of the stump. Okja FALLS OFF THE CLIFF. But the rope hung over the stum forms a pulley mechanism. And so - as Okja dives headlong with the rope in her mouth - Mija is pulled up by Okja's weight. As Okja falls and Mija rises, they lock eyes at the midpo A fleeting moment of desperate, longing sadness. When Mija reaches the tree stump, Okja unclenches her jaw and lets go of the rope - PLUMMETING towards the woods be
(Screaming)
Okja plummets further, until she's swallowed up in the gr leaves. Mija's heart breaks as she watches Okja fall afte saving her life.
There is no answer from below.
The forest is densely packed with trees. Mija desperately searches for Okja, but she is nowhere to be found.

The echo dies out, and the forest is once again silent. W only hear the BUZZING of insects and the CHIRPING of bird until... ...we hear a huge FART from somewhere in the woods. Mija quickly turns toward the sound. She sees Okja through the trees - casually chomping on grass, completely unaffected the fall. Mija runs over with a huge smile, happily swing the straw sack on her shoulder.

Okja! Are you okay? Mija checks everywhere on Okja's body for injuries. As sh does, Okja slowly slinks to the ground and lies on her ba She lets out a MOAN and pretends to be hurt while she continues to chew on the grass. She holds up her rear foo and begs for attention, like a little child. Mija looks a her foot. She sees a fresh scar near Okja's hip, blood oozing from She picks out a ripe persimmon from her sack and peels it She takes the soft inner part and rubs it gently against Okja's wound. The soft, moist sensation soothes Okja and slowly closes her eyes. Her chewing slows as well.
You like that? Okja MOANS in pleasure.

You saved my life. Again. Okja SQUEALS in response.  16. It looks like they're really talking to each other. Mija holds up Okja's large, floppy ear and whispers something. can't hear what, but the soft whisper, combined with the afternoon sunlight, leaves us with an achingly beautiful feeling. Okja nods as if responding to whatever Mija said
CLOSE ON a dinner table. Wild greens, potatoes, boiled eg pan-seared fish in the middle. It's the fish Mija caught the stream earlier. Hee Bong and Mija sit in the living r and chow on the dinner.
(out of the blue) Uncle Mundo says he's coming by tomorrow.
To collect the money? For Okja?
I already sent the money to the company.
Right. So Okja is ours now. Hee Bong nods. Mija smiles.
So why is Uncle Mundo coming? Paperwork? Without answering, Hee Bong turns away and switches on an ancient tube television. A soccer game is on.

Damn. The first half is almost over. The screen blinks on and off with static. Hee Bong slaps side of the set, making it normal again. With his eyes on soccer match, he picks up his spoon to eat when the scree blinks and dissolves into static again.
Son of a...
Great! Now we can buy a new TV!  17. Hee Bong goes over to the TV. He raises his hand to strik again when... BUZZ. The screen returns. It's as if the TV afraid of Hee Bong.
This one's perfectly fine.

(pouting) Such a tightwad... Behind Mija's disgruntled face, we see Okja poking her he out of the shed to drink water from the bucket. Hee Bong retrieves a half-drunk bottle of soju and opens it. He carefully pours the soju into the cap, and with trembling hands, lifts the tiny cap brimming with soju.

It's silent except for the sound of insects. We see the picture frames on the wall. A story spanning t years. There's a Mirando Certificate with Hee Bong's picture pri on it. It reads in English: Congratulations farmer HEE BO Raise your Super Pig with love and care! Love, Lucy Miran There's 6-year-old Mija hugging her Super Piglet. There's 12-year-old Mija tightly hugging the fully grown Okja. Mija sleeps with a comic book open in front of her. A sou wakes her up. She looks toward a tiny window in the corne the room. The window opens directly to the shed where Okj kept. We see Okja's massive butt through the window. She keeps shifting her tail, bothered by the itching in the wounded area. The tail is too short and hardly reaches the wound. Mija picks up a back scratcher from the floor. She attach long bamboo stick to the end and sits in front of the tin window. She yawns as she pokes the stick through the wind and scratches the area around Okja's wound. Mija begins to doze. She closes her eyes.  18.

MUNDO PARK (39) hikes up along the stream, covered in swe Dressed in a suit and tie, he carries a bag that bears th ‘Mirando Korea' logo. He stops for breath, and looks down mountain behind him. He takes out his phone. The signal i poor, and he holds up his phone at various angles before finally getting a bar and dialing.
Hello?
(Into the phone) Where are you? What's taking you so long?
(Out of breath) We're all so out of shape. And Dr. Johnny is being... somewhat difficult.
(Surprised) Dr. Johnny? But he's so much fun on Tv!
(Thinly) Right. On TV. But not in the water.
Water?
He dove into the water saying he couldn't stand the heat. Now he won't come out. (quietly) Aw, disgusting. I think he’s doing a secret piss.

Hee Bong stands at the faucet and pours water into a buck He turns off the faucet almost as soon as he turns it on. Still thinking he poured too much, he pours off a little the basin before handing the bucket to Mundo. Mundo gulps down the water, thoroughly covered in sweat. Mija washes Okja in the front yard.  19.
(quietly) I thought a bunch of you were coming. Mundo glances down the hill.
They're coming.
(calling over) It's nice to see you, Uncle Mundo. Why are you here? Mundo steals a glimpse at Mija.

(silently mouthing) You didn't tell her? Hee Bong looks away without answering. Mundo looks frustrated. He walks over to Okja. Mija claps and gives a sign to Okja, who obediently sits on the ground. Mundo removes the small black box on Okja's ear and unlocks the waterproof casing. He opens it to reveal various computer chips and SD card slots. He removes the SD cards and plugs them into his laptop. Numbers and graphs showing data about Okja's health aboun the screen: "Blood Pressure," "Temperature," "Heart Rate. The clean, design-conscious interface of the "Mirando Sup Pig Health/Growth Management" software. Mija looks over Mundo's shoulder, lustily eyeing his bran new Macbook when... We suddenly hear someone SHOUT in English.

Fuck me! (panting) All right. I'm here. I'm fucking here, goddamn it. Hee Bong, Mija, and Mundo all turn their heads. A large m struggles up the steep incline, bitching and moaning all way. This is Dr. JOHNNY WISEMAN.
(eyes wide) It's that guy! From TV!  She runs excitedly to Hee Bong - leaving Okja at the the yard.
(to Hee Bong) It's him, right? From Magical Animals!
You... (panting) You just had to... (panting) «+. drag me all the way up to this fucking mountain top.

(To Hee Bong) He came to meet Okja even though she isn't in the competition any more! He must think Okja is that special! Mundo looks uneasy. 20. back of Johnny suddenly notices Mija. Then he is abruptly back to panting and bitching.

All the other Super Pigs were on flat land, accessible by car. Japan's Super Pig was about a five minute drive from the airport. I notice that you leave the fucking mountain top Super Pig to the end because you knew the climb would rile me. Well, guess what? I'm riled. Johnny's companions stand around awkwardly. There's JENNI the Marketing Director from Mirando HQ (30s, American). S wears a DSLR over her neck. And there's a Korean TV crew CHANG (35), the cameraman, and CHOI (26, female) the interpreter/assistant. Choi looks back and forth between Johnny and Hee Bong, tr to smile the awkwardness away.
Well, can someone at least bring me some water? Given that I am about to be filmed for fucking television?  21. Choi RUSHES over to the faucet and begins to pour.
Not sparkling water. I don't want to belch my way through the broadcast.

I don't think they have sparkling water here. (to Hee Bong) Excuse me, sir, if you don't mind. Dr. Johnny's a bit thirsty from the hike. But Johnny spots Hee Bong's green soju bottle. He stomps and snatches it up.
Soju... Before Hee Bong can react, Johnny cracks open the bottle downs the soju in one swig.

Ah, I was saving that... Johnny lets out a refreshed, drunken sigh. Hee Bong looks devastated. Mija stifles her laughter. Johnny spots Okja for the first time. As he does his personality changes totally - he looks INCREDIBLY EXCITED
There she is!
This is Okja!
She's wonderful. He rushes over to Okja and begins caressing her body. Thi real, touching enthusiasm.
(softly) Just perfect! (furiously, to Chang the cameraman) Well, fucking film me! You can't fake these emotions.  22.
(yelling at Chang) Film him! Chang hurriedly switches the camera on and dances around, fishing for the right angle. Jennifer snaps away on her D

(to Choi) Get him his doctor's coat! Choi hurriedly retrieves a white doctor's coat from her b It has the Mirando logo emblazoned on it. She scurries ov to Johnny and helps him into it. Johnny continues to caress Okja - her well-developed musc faultless skin, and taut curves, his expression one of aw

(to the camera) Ten years ago twenty-six local farmers in twenty-six far-flung countries were each given a super piglet. This year I've traveled to each of the twenty-six farms to meet the Super Pigs and decide which one will be invited to the BEST SUPER PIG FEST in New York City, where they'll be unveiled to the world!
(to Hee Bong) What's he saying?
Shhh! They're filming! Johnny looks at Hee Bong with sincere respect, giving him big thumbs up.
You've done an incredible job. Hee Bong doesn't need a translator to understand. He hold his thumb. Jennifer is ecstatic. This is exactly what she wanted.
(to Chang) Pan from Johnny to the old man!  23.
(to Chang) Pan! Chang pans from Johnny to Hee Bong.
(to Johnny) This is it! The moment of mutual trust between Mirando's very own Dr. Johnny and the esteemed local farmer.
(to Hee Bong) She's truly exceptional.
(a thick Korean accent) Ssank you so much.
How did you do it? What was your method? Choi translates. 'Uh..' Hee Bong thinks. A brief silence everyone watches Hee Bong.
I just... uh, let her run around is all. Hee Bong laughs. Choi translates.

(to the camera) He just let her run around! How beguiling! (beat) I'm not supposed to do this... I mean I'm supposed to go back to America and examine all the data before making my decision and yada yada yada... But... Johnny winks at the camera.

(dramatically) Jennifer? Two medals please. Chang pans to Jennifer as she takes out two 'Best Super P medals and hands them to Johnny.  24. Johnny puts one medal over Hee Bong's neck and another ov Okja's neck. Okja BLOWS in Johnny's face, covering his face with drool Johnny responds with his trademark UPROARIOUS LAUGH.
(to Okja) We have our winner! Ready for the festival in New York City?
What's going on?
One more medal please! Jennifer hands another medal to Johnny. Johnny walks over Mija.
A special medal for a special lady who I’m sure helped raise the Super Pig too in her own special way! Johnny ceremoniously puts the medal over Mija’s neck.
Get some cutaways of the pig! Chang dutifully does. After he's gone, Johnny talks quiet to Mija.

I'm sorry I was kinda grumpy when I first arrived on your farm. Being a television presenter can be stressful. Mija looks blank - she has no idea what he's saying. As Chang gets cutaways of Okja, Mundo tries to squeeze in the frame.
Hey! No! With a hand gesture, Jennifer shoos Mundo out of the shot Mundo lingers awkwardly. He walks over to Hee Bong and WHISPERS something in his ear.  25.

(still talking to Mija) I always have to be 'on'. Especially now I find myself the ‘face of the Mirando Corporation'! How did that even happen?! Hee Bong grabs Mija's hand and takes her to the corner of yard.
What?
I... Let's go visit your mom and dad up there.
Now? Why? I want to watch this.

Our plan is to put a stop to their project by exposing the lab and its crimes against animals. But to do so, we need video from inside - footage of the horrible atrocities being committed in the lab. And there's a problem. Mija is now completely immersed in the story. She looks a him intently.

The security is impenetrable. Other groups have tried and failed to get in. (Beat) But there is a way. Although we will only go ahead with it if you give us your consent.  51. At this, K stops translating and stares at Jay. So do the other A.L.F. members. Jay nods.
(protesting) If this kid doesn't give her consent, we're going to abandon the mission?

(to K) Please don't translate. Hold on. (to everyone) We do not harm any non-human or human. This little girl is Okja's family and I will not harm her by forcing a mission upon her that she does not consent to.
We have to abort just because some man from the 1970s wrote a fucking ‘credo'?
Tradition doesn't make a movement strong.

(coughing violently) WE make a movement strong. Jay looks around coolly at his riled up colleagues. He doesn't have to raise his voice. His quiet charisma insta subdues everyone. The trailer, once again silent.
(Calmly) If that's how you feel call yourself something else and not the A.L.F. and don't come around here anymore. The members look abashed by Jay's words. Jay quietly gaze into Mija's eyes.
In order to expose Mirando we need video from inside the laboratory... K hesitates briefly before continuing to translate.  52.

And this is where your Okja comes in. The Mirando scientists are dying to get their hands on her at their underground lab. Their star super pig! They’re desperate to put her through a slew of tests. (Beat) Which is why we've made this. K removes a small, black electronic device from his pocke and shows it to Mija.

It looks exactly like the black box on Okja's ear, right? But this one has a transmitter that will wirelessly send their video feed to us. We want to replace the device on Okja's ear with this, so Okja can send us a live feed from inside the laboratory.
(in Korean - to Mija) It will be like Okja's hidden camera show! Mija is still confused.
You want to send Okja to America? To this laboratory?
(nodding) I'm sorry. That was indeed our plan. Rescue Okja, replace the black box, and let Mirando retake Okja. Mija can't believe what she's hearing.

But don’t worry. They won't hurt Okja. They wouldn't dare. She needs to be perfect for their beauty pageant. Whatever tests they'll do on her in there will need to be harmless. Mija nods but looks concerned.  53.

You have to trust us. We've been planning this mission for a long time. We have a detailed plan on how to rescue her from the event in New York City. We promise to bring her back to you. We hear POLICE SIRENS growing closer in the background. J carefully puts a hand on Mija's shoulder.

If our mission succeeds we'll be able to shut down Mirando's Super Pig project completely. We'll be saving millions of Super Pigs like Okja from death. Jay looks straight into Mija's eyes, pleading earnestly. looks straight back.
But we won't do it without your approval. Mija looks at Jay with a grave expression. The police sir in the distance get louder...
What is your decision? K translates the last question in a solemn voice.

I'm going back to the mountain with Okja. She says it just like that - bluntly and squarely. In Kor it sounds even more blunt and square. K tries to hide his surprise, speechless. Jay and the other members eagerly a his translation. K takes a deep breath before saying...

She agrees to the mission. Neither Mija nor the A.L.F. members notice K's lie. The members applaud vigorously. Jay gives her a warm, sincere hug, deeply moved. Mija stands there, not knowing what ju happened.
Thank you.  54. The SIRENS are closer than ever. The members put on their balaclavas. kK opens the small s door of the trailer. Cold wind rushes in. He yells into his cell phone:
Go!! He takes out a Ziplock bag from his pocket and puts his m tablet and iPhone in the bag. The members form a single f before him and deposit their own cell phones into the bag

The sun has nearly set. The black semi races through the riverside road. We see police cars and Mirando security c chasing after it with SIRENS blaring. The semi steers toward the railing, so close that we plai see the dark river below. While other A.L.F. members hesi nervously, Silver limps to the door and fearlessly jumps the truck.
Aaaaah - !!
Motivated by Silver, Blond and Red dive off after him. Ja the last one to put his cell phone in K's Ziplock bag. He turns to Mija.
Till we meet again. Jay swiftly dives out of the truck. K winks at Mija as he closes the Ziplock bag bulging with cell phones.

A BIKER riding along the bank looks up in surprise when a black figure jumps from the expressway above and SPLASHES into the water. SPLASH, SPLASH. Columns of water go up, a the black figures subsequently swim out of the water one one. JOGGERS stop and watch the bizarre spectacle.  55.

Once K jumps, the A.L.F. member who was driving stops the truck and runs out. He throws his outdated folder phone i the river and himself jumps off the expressway. SPLASH. The police cars and Mirando security cars surround the bl semi. POLICEMEN run out of their vehicles and look down a the river, defeated. The circular ripples from the last splash slowly disperse.
You swim?

Uh-uh. Never. While the Police look for a way down to the bank, the Uniformed Mirando Employees open the door of the trailer. Headlights and red police lights flood inside the trailer reveal Okja and a wide-eyed Mija standing side by side. M tries to hide her confusion and anger, but her eyes are m with tears.
The Animal Liberation Front...
ON THE TV: Amateur footage of A.L.F. members with bolt cutters and other tools ambushing the Mirando truck in th underpass.

..-hasn't been in the headlines for a number of years, but they are back in the spotlight after today's extraordinary events. 16 people - including Lucy Mirando, Frank, Johnny, and Jennifer - sit around the table and watch the news. They silent, their expressions grave. The scene looks exactly the photo of Obama, Hillary and the national security tea watching the Bin Laden raid in the White House situation - right down to the gestures and the facial expressions. The only unruffled person among them is head assistant Fr who sits in the middle in a leisurely, presidential manne

The group seems to have been highly organized.  56. ON THE TV: We see KIM - the Mirando driver - being interviewed in front of the truck spray-painted with the "A.L.F." sign. He speaks surprisingly good English.

(smiling) They were fast, organized, and on point, like ninjas. No way a salary man from Mirando could take them. (laughs) Mirando is completely fucked! Completely fucked! A BEEP censors Kim every time he says "fucked," but he sa it with such emphasis that it is impossible not to read h lips. The Mirando employees bat their eyes nervously, worried a Lucy's reaction. ON THE TV: A repeat of the news footage of A.L.F. members running in formation.
Look at that one! He points at the blurry figure of Silver, lagging behind.
Get some exercise, you dick! He laughs and glances at Lucy for approval. The tension i palpable.
I wouldn't worry too much, Luce. The A.L.F technically failed.
They weren't even able to take the product.
This is just a kerfuffle over nothing. We shouldn't make a big deal out of it.
It actually means the security at our US facilities and main office is so airtight that they wouldn't even think about breaking in. That's why they went all the way to South Korea.  57.
The important thing is that the pig is on its way to New York now.
(Brightly) Right! The Best Super Pig Fest will continue as planned! Their eyes flicker nervously towards Lucy - who has thus said nothing. Finally, she stirs.
(quietly) I know what they call me. They call me a psychopath.
YOU'RE not a psychopath! THEY'RE the psychopaths, right, Ms. Mirando? They're narcissists. Jennifer glances around the conference room, pleased with herself.
Do narcissists wear balaclavas?

Oh, crazy radicals have been calling us psychopaths since the "60s! You're a psychopath! Your sister's a psychopath! Your daddy was a psychopath! We barely notice, but Frank has a CELLPHONE concealed in hand. We see the name "Nancy Mirando" on the screen. He's surreptitiously pointing it in Lucy's direction.
Daddy WAS a psychopath, Frank. That's not an unfair slur. "What did YOU do in the War, Daddy?" "I manufactured the napalm that made everyone's skin fall off!" And he calls ME an idiot loser?
In fairness to your father when he called you an idiot loser...
Yes?  58.
You had just signed up for a two year course in California called Unleash Your Calling.

At a highly respected Institute for the Advancement of Human Potential. Where many forward-thinking CEOs go. Lucy's anxiety level is rising. She's beginning to displa subtle OCD symptoms - repeating phrases and movements.

And if you can't see the correlation between the advancement of my human potential and the fact we're currently on the cusp of the biggest product launch in the history of the food industry then I don't know what! You know how I spent my time at the Institute? VISUALIZING new and better ways of doing business! While SISTER was... what was the name of the lake that exploded?
Moose Lake.

While my sister was dumping so much toxic waste into Moose Lake it EXPLODED... the only lake ever to explode, well done, Nancy... I was visualizing how to turn the most hated agrochemical company in America into the most likeable miracle pig rearing company. And it's WORKING! It's WORKING! It was WORKING until last night. Until last night the synthesis between New Mirando and Old Mirando was impeccable! Lucy holds both of her hands in the air.
I took science... Lucy manipulates her left hand into a deformed claw.  59.
And nature... Lucy waves her right hand softly, mimicking ocean waves o field of crops blowing gently in the wind.
And I synthesized. She brings both hands together, mimicking a flower bloomi

And EVERYONE loved it. Remember what the New York Times called our Super Pigs? "Intriguing." Slate: "Lucy Mirando is pulling off the impossible. She's making us fall in love with a creature that we're also excited about eating." These are journalists who never write about pigs! They never write about pigs! But they wrote about OUR pigs. Ten years of planning! We're on the cusp of launching a product that will feed MILLIONS! And what happens? We fall victim to terrorism. And somehow WE'RE the ones that come out looking bad?
(brightly) Oh, we don't look too bad!

We don't? Rewind! A beat. Jennifer nervously presses rewind - knowing Lucy right about how bad they look. ON THE TV: Footage of the moment of Okja's recapture. Uniformed Mirando Employees drag Okja back to the Mirando truck. We see Mija crying and desperately trying to stop them.

Following the failed kidnapping, Mirando Company employees were securing their super pig when a young girl suddenly stepped in and tried to stop them. ON THE TV: Uniformed Mirando Employees - the guys Mundo h promised full time contracts to - pull Mija away. They're rough, violent.  60.
The girl was later revealed to be the granddaughter of a local farmer selected by Mirando CEO Lucy Mirando to...
Pause. Jennifer does. ON THE TV: FREEZE-FRAME of the Uniformed Employees roughl pulling the poor, crying Mija away.
And there it is! The image that's going to destroy us! Who are those idiots? Lucy points at the Uniformed Employees.
Find out and fire them.
(Brightly) Sure! Leave it with me! Jennifer looks delighted and relieved that others are get the blame.
Abusing that adorable girl in the uniforms I personally designed! What are we famous for? A silence, before it dawns on the Executives that Lucy is asking a rhetorical question.
Super pigs?
Holding indigenous farmers in high esteem! Who are we violently manhandling right there on TV?
(beat) The granddaughter of an indigenous farmer.  61.
Is that the reason why she's crying?
(cautiously) Yes?
It's one of two reasons she's crying. What's the other reason?
(beat) We're taking away her super pig?

We are shoving her best friend into a truck! That's going to kill us. Right there. That image. We're dead. Unbeknownst to Lucy, Frank has his phone pressed to his e listening. He puts it down. Suddenly, he pushes his chair back with a loud SQUEAK. He casually saunters over to the coffee machine and makes himself a capsule coffee. The machine pisses out coffee with a loud, obnoxious WHIR.
Lucy... May I say something? Frank looks over at Lucy as he smells his coffee.
The girl. You're thinking of inviting her to New York, aren't you? A light bulb goes off in Lucy's head.
I was just about to say that!
Yes, of course. (nods ) You'll invite her to The Best Super Pig Festival and...
(cutting him off) A moving reunion! The Best Pig and the adorable farmer girl forced to part but reunited on our stage.  62.
Of course! (smiles) Brilliant, Lucy.
An emotional reunion, then the two of them leave the stage. Hand in hand. Hand in trotter! Frank watches Lucy become more and more excited. He is mo laid back than ever.

She'll be the face of the Mirando Company! The living embodiment of the Mirando ideal. Young, pretty, eco-friendly, global! She's a godsend! Are you writing all this down?! Jennifer and the Executives write notes with fury. Suddenly Johnny stands up in a HUFF.
Uh. She's not the face of the Mirando Company. I am. You don't even know if she can DO anything other than cry. Whereas I am much loved all over the world!
(With unexpected venom) Sit down. Johnny lets out a GASP.
You're... forcing me to...
To do WHAT?
To examine my options.

Go on then. Examine them. Are you examining them now? Have you finished examining them? Lucy stares at Johnny. He sits down - his humiliation complete.  63. Lucy resumes her conversation with Jennifer like nothing happened.

Get her a first-class ticket and book her a hotel! She probably doesn't have a passport. Get her a passport! Don't try to force an image on her - like what Benetton did to those Asian girl models. Jennifer takes notes with impossible speed, her pen a mer blur.
No! I've got a BETTER idea! Get her wearing a Mirando uniform. Let's reclaim the uniform after what those idiots did!
Lucy's limp body is sprawled on the sofa. Her iPhone ring The words Nancy Mirando flash up on the screen.
(Muttering) Oh fuck off. Lucy ignores it. But the phone keeps ringing. Finally Luc picks up.
Hey Nance!
Hey Luce!
I guess you saw the news. Don't worry. It's under control.
What news? What are you talking about?
(beat) Oh. Nothing. (beat) So, how's London? Do you ever get time to go to fun places like the London Eye and the London Dungeon? (MORE )
I never have a free minute, but I figure running Mirando Global is more taxing than running Mirando UK. Oh! You should try Madam Tussauds! Have you been there yet?
(beat) No.

I heard such an interesting thing about Madam Tussauds. When the celebrities become has-beens they just melt down the heads and turn them into someone more fashionable. Saddam Hussain is Justin Timberlake now. Anyway. How ARE you?
I just phoned to wish you luck. 10 years! Your dream project is finally about to come to fruition! Everything you've worked towards!
Yeah, it's exciting!
It must be, right? The basket containing all of your eggs! Every single one of your eggs! You must be SO excited. The blood drains from Lucy's face. Nancy can still terrif her.
You must be SO excited!
Mija crouches inside the police station. A few REPORTERS surround her, shoving their microphones into her face.
They're going to charge you with property damage and obstruction of justice. Did you know that? Mija looks blank.  65.
Animal Liberal Front, right? People are saying you're a member. Is that true? Mija stays silent, her head lowered. The Reporter comes closer.

It says on the Internet you have an A.L.F. tattoo on your arm. Reporter 2 tries to lift up her sleeve, but Mija slaps hi hand away. A FEMALE REPORTER who'd been watching from beh jumps in and tries to forcibly pull up Mija's sleeve. Mij resists mightily. As she grapples with the Female Reporte we see someone hurtling into the station in the backgroun with a worried face - Hee Bong. Hee Bong squeezes in between the Reporters and grabs Mija arm. He raises the sleeve himself.
Let me see! The Reporters briefly step back at Hee Bong's apparent aggression. Hee Bong checks Mija's arms, neck, everywhere

Tell me where you were hurt. Are you okay? With that, the floodgates open. Mija puts her arms around Bong and begins to bawl. Hee Bong embraces her tightly. T Reporters quickly realize who Hee Bong is and shove their mics toward him. FLASHES explode.
Stop with the cameras... She's just a baby.
You're her guardian, aren't you?
Go away... Hee Bong hides Mija with one arm while pushing away the Reporters with the other. He is never violent but puts up formidable fight as he fends them off. He is old but stro

Be civil, will you? Don't test me now...  66. The Reporters are backing away when one of them suddenly down and POPS a flash up at Mija's face. Hee Bong violent SLAPS the camera away, stunning the Reporter.

Sorry! That's an expensive camera. As soon as he apologizes he returns to roughly pushing th reporters. The grappling match becomes more and more heat DETECTIVES and POLICE OFFICERS belatedly swarm the scene. The station quickly descends into chaos. Suddenly, a familiar voice rings throughout the station.

Mi -Ja-! Mundo is walking into the station. Choi - the Mirando Kor translator from the mountain - follows him with a flower basket. Wearing a radiant smile, Mundo walks past bewilde faces and hands the flower basket to Mija. It is lavishly decorated with Mirando company colors.
The store is brightly lit by fluorescent lights. Mija sta at the window-side bar and eats cup ramen. The flower bas lies next to her. Mundo and Hee Bong and Choi smoke in fr of the store.
So all the damage in the shopping center... Mirando will pay for that too?
How many times do I have to tell you? HQ is paying for everything. The main office in America.
The glass door in your office Mija shattered. That too?

That's what you're worried about? They are inviting her out to America. She'll be doing Mirando commercials pretty soon. Having finished her ramen, Mija walks out toward Hee Bong Mundo. She hurls the Mirando flower basket at Mundo's fee  67.
Forget commercials. Get her on the phone right now!
(startled) Phone? Who?
I need to talk to Okja. I need to find out how she is. Choi stares blankly.
They do that... you know, talk to each other. They’ve always done it.
(scrambling) Okja's probably on the plane right now. She won't be able to answer. OVER Mija's seething face, we hear the deafening noise of airplane. As upbeat MONTAGE MUSIC begins, we...
We see a large passenger airliner from behind as it touch down on a landing strip. The wheels touch the ground with ear-splitting noise.

As the MONTAGE MUSIC continues, we see large CARGO being unloaded from the back of the plane. We follow one of the containers - a large metal cage. We see Okja crouched ins MIRANDO HQ EMPLOYEES and PRIVATE SECURITY CONTRACTORS swa the cage as soon as it hits the tarmac.

Okja sits inside the cage with a sullen expression. She nervously blinks her eyes.  68. OKJA'S POV: Through a small opening on the side, she sees unfamiliar scenery of New York passing by. The fake black box/video transmission device is also pointed outside.

head_text.subj: I/E. A.L.F. SEDAN, NEW YORK STREETS

text: The A.L.F. team is crowded into the Sedan. Brief static a K's laptop begins receiving the video signal from Okja.

Got it! The signal's good. (to the members in the backseat) We're seeing what Okja's seeing. K sits in the passenger seat with his laptop connected to satellite receiver. Through the front windshield, we see Mirando truck about 50 meters ahead of the sedan.
(driving) Hey, pretty good resolution. Can't wait to see inside the laboratory!

Brought to you live from Mirando's secret underground lab. We invite you to the mecca of genetic modification! Blond giggles as he imitates a travel channel host. He ke pushing a sandwich into Silver's hand, who only picks at and looks through its contents. Jay sits behind K and qui regards the laptop screen.

(barely containing his excitement ) In this moment only the five of us know what the whole world will soon know. This mission has the potential to surpass ...my God... we may surpass even the Silver Spring Monkey liberation in terms of epoch-defining A.L.F. operations! We are ushering in a new era! The members cringe at Jay’s pompous way of talking. An awkward silence. K yells to Red, trying to change the moo  69.
Slow down. Let's put some distance between us and them. I want to test how far the signal reaches.
The MONTAGE MUSIC escalates. The East River glistens unde the sun. A vast AERIAL VIEW: The Mirando truck crosses th bridge, surrounded by escort vehicles. We see the A.L.F. sedan far behind.
The MONTAGE MUSIC continues. Mija wears a passport/ticket pouch over her neck, the one given to unaccompanied minors. Hee Bong takes out the gol pig from his pocket.

Take this. In case there's an emergency. You might need money. Make sure you hide it well. Mija takes it, hugs Hee Bong. Mundo hurries Mija toward t departure gate, where reporters are gathered. Choi hands a large bouquet.
Where’s Okja now? Why won't you let me talk to her?

(forced smile) We'll call her soon! Let's take a picture first. A shoddy event obviously organized at the last minute. ‘Congratulations - Winner of the Best Super Pig World Competition. Joo Mija Send-Off Ceremony.' The Mirando Kor BRANCH PRESIDENT and the DIRECTOR of the National Livesto Cooperative have already taken their places under the ban Mundo shoves Mija between them. Mija forces a toothy smil cameras FLASH.
(to Mundo - through her forced smile) You want me to be nice in New York? Get me Okja on the phone.  70.

The MONTAGE MUSIC continues. CLOSE on a screen: We see an amateur You Tube VIDEO of Mi riding Okja in the Seoul supermarket. It’s had 126 millio views. A team of young MIRANDO MARKETING EMPLOYEES sit in front their computers and eagerly watch their boss, Jennifer.

(Brightly) And... GO! All at once, the Mirando Marketing Employees begin enthusiastically typing. CLOSE on their screens: They're typing messages on TWITTE and TUMBLR and FACEBOOK and YOU TUBE and INSTAGRAM - an orchestrated corporate endeavor to flood the Internet wit Mirando positivity: "Yo, I heard the hot You Tube girl riding the giant pig i coming to NYC!!!" "Cute!" "Totally my type!" "She's gonna at the Mirando Best Super Pig Fest in NYC!! AWESOME!" "LO HER!!!" "The hot girl and Dr. Johnny and the giant pig together in NYC!!! SO COOL!!!"

Mija sleeps, her body awkwardly folded in her first-class seat. A FEMALE CABIN ATTENDANT stops to pull up her blark She removes the “Smile: Beginner's Conversation English" from her hand and puts it in the seat-back pocket. Mija sweats from a nightmare. Her eyes twitch under the lids.

Grainy B & W footage. POV of Mija sitting in the backseat a compact car: Okja - at this point a piglet - looks up from Mija's embr and tries to lick her face/the CAMERA. In the front seat, see the back of Mija's DAD, who turns toward Mija, but wh face is washed featureless by the strong backlight. We al see the silhouette of Mija's MOM in the next seat. Her mo is open wide as if to scream, but we can't hear anything.  71. Through the front windshield, we see a large truck crossi the yellow line of the narrow mountain road and hurtling toward Mija's car. Okja the piglet SQUEALS in the foregro

The car is crashed in the woods on the steep incline bordering the road. Okja crawls out of the broken window looks inside the car with a worried look. We see five-yea old Mija bleeding, her eyes out of focus. Okja climbs tow the road as fast as she can.

Grainy footage from a fixed high angle CAMERA... seems to traffic camera footage from the road: Okja climbs onto the road and begins SQUEALING franticall toward the cars as they whiz by dangerously close to her. car stops, and a YOUNG MAN steps out. Okja continues to SQUEAL as she leads the man down to the woods. The man discovers the wreckage and hurries down the incline after her. The upbeat MONTAGE MUSIC changes into...

head_text.subj: I/E. LABORATORY ENTRANCE, PARAMUS, NEW JERSEY

text: CLOSE ON Okja's terrified face as she's dragged into the dilapidated warehouse - the front for the laboratory. The lights are dim and the atmosphere ominous.

The A.L.F. team is gathered around the laptop, eyes anxio on the screen. Red opens the large bag and takes out a ro satellite dish. K connects the satellite dish to the receiver. With the d up, static decreases and the image becomes clearer.
Are we recording?
Of course. We begin to see the inside of the secret laboratory throu Okja's POV. The A.L.F. members all lean in.  72.
Oh my God.

Okja's POV: We see small cages lined on either side of th hallway, each containing tiny Super Piglets: A piglet wit hideously large tumor, one with red, veiny eyes and neck- twitching tic symptoms, one dragging its deformed hind legs... Victims of genetic experimentation. They SQUEAL loudly wh they see Okja. Okja also lets out a heart-wrenching SQUEA if commiserating with the piglets in the cages. The seasoned MIRANDO LABORATORY WORKERS move Okja toward steel door, pulling on her leash and poking her from behi with stun batons. The Worker in the front opens the door reveal an immaculate white room. Inside the room is none other than Dr. Johnny Wiseman! He greets Okja enthusiastically, dressed in a white gown.
Okja! He runs his hands over Okja's body.

So we reunite. In this wretched laboratory no less. Johnny lovingly caresses Okja's face, clearly drunk. Behi him, we see a hideous male Super Pig twisting its giganti body. It is about 1.5 times the size of Okja.

Let me introduce you to each other. Alfonso, say hello to Okja! Okja, Alfonso! Your boyfriend! Haha! Johnny drags Okja toward ALFONSO, the male pig. As the st door shuts with a loud CLANK, the MONTAGE MUSIC abruptly stops. Oppressive SILENCE fills the screen.

Heavy silence. The faces of the A.L.F. members are lit by ghostly light of the computer screen.  73. They are seeing Okja's POV, but because one side of the ‘White Room' is covered entirely by a mirror, they see everything Okja is going through. Johnny and the Lab Workers drag Okja toward Alfonso, who increasingly excited at the sight of her. Okja's fearful SCREAM pierces the computer speakers.
Can you turn down the volume, please? K lowers the volume, his face filled with dread.
(Sobbing) We should never have sent her there.
Stop it!
We knowingly sent her into that chamber of horrors...
No we didn't! We didn't know they'd hurt her! That, you know, they’d put her through a ...mating.

We suspected. Come on. We all suspected. Okja's SCREAM and Red's sobbing become blended in a sorro harmony. The male members sit in uncomfortable silence. K looks especially distraught. Jay quietly approaches Red a puts a hand on her shoulder.
Don't cry. We can't be weak.
Right. This is all the more reason to stay focused and stick to our plan.
The little girl trusted us with Okja. We have to respect her bravery. K cannot keep it to himself any longer.  74.
She never agreed to send Okja. What? All eyes fall on K. Red stops crying.
What did you just say?
When she was in our truck... She said she was "taking Okja back to the mountains." Jay and the members are speechless.
(sighs) I lied.
You little piece of shit! I knew something was up in that truck!
(Quietly) Why did you lie?

I don't know. In that moment... I just couldn't stop the mission. It was the coolest mission ever. K stares at the cool A.L.F. tattoo on his wrist. Jay gets from the sofa and walks over. He gently lays a hand on K' shoulder.
K, it's okay. Look at me. As soon as K looks up - POW - Jay drives a fist across hi face. Before the other members can even react, Jay pushes into a corner and begins pummeling him mercilessly.

I hold you dear to my heart - as I do all creatures - but you have dishonored the forty year history and meaningful legacy of the Animal Liberation Front. You have betrayed the great minds and brave fighters who preceded you. Even as he unloads a savage beating, Jay maintains his fo manner of speech, speaking like he's at an academic semin  75.
You have besmirched a forty year tradition. Jay withdraws his fists and gathers his breath. He looks at K.
Never mistranslate. Translations are sacred. Jay throws a bag at K.

From this moment on you are no longer a member of the A.L.F. You are permanently banned. Get out. However, since it's vital that we proceed with our mission, we will have to return your equipment after its completion. Consider this your last contribution to the A.L.F. K wipes the blood off his lips, dejected, disgraced. He p the bag over his shoulder and begins to walk out. He stop the table and adjusts the position of the satellite dish. When he does, the image on the laptop instantly becomes clearer.

CLOSE ON a green soju bottle. Johnny picks it up and gulp down. Alfonso isn't in the room anymore. Okja is sprawled the floor, lifeless. A dreadful silence. The heavily inebriated Johnny takes the remainder of the soju and wal over to Okja. He crouches before her.
You want some? He pours some on his hand and brings it to her mouth. Okj closes her nostrils, repulsed by the smell. Johnny doesn' care. He just slurps it up himself. He licks every last d
It makes you feel better. Okja is completely drained from the brutal mating session with Alfonso, barely moving. Johnny also lies on the floo resting his head on his arm, face to face with Okja.  76.
The first time is the hardest. It'll get easier. Johnny lets out a melancholy sigh.

Oh, this is a unspeakable place. I know, I know. And this room isn't even the worst. There are worse rooms out there. (Beat) Lucy Mirando told me I wasn't to harm you in here. At least not visibly. She wants you perfect for her big telecast! Johnny starts to rise.
But when a woman humiliates a man in front of his colleagues, a man is inclined to make his own decisions. Johnny suddenly picks up a piece of long metallic equipme from the floor.
